Windows Software Development Kit Redistributable Code
=====================================================
The following list is a list of files available with Microsoft Windows SDK for Windows Server 2008 and .NET Framework 3.5 for redistribution under the Windows SDK license.  If the Microsoft software you have licensed is not Windows SDK , only the files that are installed by the Microsoft software may be redistributed under such license.



Static LIB files
================
Subject to the license terms for the software, the following .lib files may be distributed unmodified when built as part of your application:

	Microsoft SDKs\Windows\v6.1\lib, 
	Microsoft SDKs\Windows\v6.1\lib\x64 or 
	Microsoft SDKs\Windows\v6.1\lib\ia64
		ad1.lib
		adslid.lib
		ahadmin.lib
		amstrmid.lib
		Bits.lib
		certidl.lib
		CiUuid.lib
		clfsmgmt.lib
		corguids.lib
		daouuid.lib
		dmoguids.lib
		DtcHelp.lib
		Fci.lib
		Fdi.lib
		fileextd.lib
		format.lib
		GdiPlus.lib
		gpmuuid.lib
		Htmlhelp.lib
		iepmapi.lib
		KSGuid.lib
		ksuser.lib
		mfuuid.lib
		MiniDump.lib
		MMC.lib
		MqOA.lib
		msdasc.lib
		MSTask.lib
		MsXml2.lib
		msxml6.lib
		muiload.lib
		odbccp32.lib
		oledb.lib
		osptk.lib
		PEnter.lib
		PhotoAcquireUID.lib
		PortableDeviceGuids.lib
		sapi.lib
		ScrnSave.lib
		ScrnSavW.lib
		SearchSDK.lib
		shell32.lib
		SrClient.lib
		strmiids.lib
		strsafe.lib
		structuredquery.lib
		Svcguid.lib
		taskschd.lib
		TranscodeImageUID.lib
		unicows.lib
		Uuid.lib
		vds_uuid.lib
		WbemUuid.lib
		wcmguid.lib
		WiaGuid.lib
		windowscodecs.lib
		WindowsSideShowGuids.lib
		WinStrm.lib
		wmcodecdspuuid.lib
		WS2_32.lib
		wuguid.lib
		xaSwitch.lib




Windows SDK Tools
=====================================
Subject to the license terms for the software, the following files may be distributed 
unmodified:

	MageUI.exe
	Mage.exe
	xperf_ia64.msi
	xperf_x64.msi
	xperf_x86.msi


.NET Framework
=====================================
The Windows SDK does not include any of the .NET Framework redistributable files, you must download these files from Microsoft Downloads (http://www.microsoft.com/downloads).  Subject to the license terms for the software, the following .EXE file may be distributed unmodified:

	dotNetFx35setup.exe


.NET Compact Framework V3.5
=====================================
Subject to the license terms for the software, you may redistribute the MSI (unmodified) or one or more of the separate files from the SDK ISO image listed below:

	Located on the Windows SDK DVD ISO image:
		NETCFSetupv35.msi
		NETCFv35.wm.armv4i.cab
		NETCFv35.ppc.armv4.cab
		NETCFv35.wce.x86.cab
		NETCFv35.wce.sh4.cab
		NETCFv35.wce.mipsiv.cab
		NETCFv35.wce.mipsii.cab
		NETCFv35.wce.armv4.cab
		NETCFv35.Messages.DE.cab
		NETCFv35.Messages.DE.wm.cab
		NETCFv35.Messages.EN.cab
		NETCFv35.Messages.EN.wm.cab
		NETCFv35.Messages.ES.cab
		NETCFv35.Messages.ES.wm.cab
		NETCFv35.Messages.FR.cab
		NETCFv35.Messages.FR.wm.cab
		NETCFv35.Messages.IT.cab
		NETCFv35.Messages.IT.wm.cab
		NETCFv35.Messages.JA.cab
		NETCFv35.Messages.JA.wm.cab
		NETCFv35.Messages.KO.cab
		NETCFv35.Messages.KO.wm.cab
		NETCFv35.Messages.zh-CHS.cab
		NETCFv35.Messages.zh-CHS.wm.cab
		NETCFv35.Messages.zh-CHT.cab
		NETCFv35.Messages.zh-CHT.wm.cab



Visual C++ Compiler Redist files
=====================================
Subject to the license terms for the software, you may redistribute MSM files listed below unmodified as a part of your installation package:

	Microsoft SDKs\Windows\v6.1\Redist
		microsoft.vcxx.crt.i64_msm.msm
		microsoft.vcxx.crt.x64_msm.msm
		microsoft.vcxx.crt.x86_msm.msm
		policy.x.xx.microsoft.vcxx.crt.i64_msm.msm
		policy.x.xx.microsoft.vcxx.crt.x64_msm.msm
		policy.x.xx.microsoft.vcxx.crt.x86_msm.msm

For your convenience, we have provided the following folders for use when redistributing VC++ runtime files. Subject to the license terms for the software, you may redistribute the folder (unmodified) in the application local folder as a sub-folder with no change to the folder name. You may also redistribute all the files (*.dll and *.manifest) within a folder, listed below the folder for your convenience, as an entire set. 

	Microsoft Viual Studio 9.0\VC\redist\x86\Microsoft.VC90.CRT\
		Microsoft.VC90.CRT.manifest
		msvcm90.dll
		msvcp90.dll
		msvcr90.dll



TabletPC 1.7
=====================================
Subject to the license terms for the software, you may redistribute MSM files listed below unmodified as a part of your installation package:

	IACOM.msm
	IACore.msm
	IAWinFrm.msm
	IAWinFX.msm
	InkDiv.msm
	journal.msm
	journalMAN.msm
	rtscom.msm
	tpcman17.msm
